sn51.15:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
sn51.15:4.3: Atha kho uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
sn51.15:4.5: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn51.15:4.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
sn51.15:4.7: “kimatthiyaṃ nu kho, bho ānanda, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti?
sn51.15:5.1: “Atthi pana, bho ānanda, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti?
sn51.15:5.2: “Atthi kho, brāhmaṇa, maggo, atthi paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti.
sn51.15:6.1: “Katamo pana, bho ānanda, maggo katamā paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti?
sn51.15:6.2: “Idha, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi … pe …
sn51.15:6.5: ayaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti.
sn51.15:7.1: “Evaṃ sante, bho ānanda, santakaṃ hoti no asantakaṃ.
sn51.15:7.5: Yathā te khameyya tathā taṃ byākareyyāsi.
sn51.15:7.6: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, brāhmaṇa, ahosi te pubbe chando ‘ārāmaṃ gamissāmī’ti?
sn51.15:7.7: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yo tajjo chando so paṭippassaddho”ti?
sn51.15:7.10: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yaṃ tajjaṃ vīriyaṃ taṃ paṭippassaddhan”ti?
sn51.15:7.13: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yaṃ tajjaṃ cittaṃ taṃ paṭippassaddhan”ti?
sn51.15:7.16: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yā tajjā vīmaṃsā sā paṭippassaddhā”ti?
sn51.15:8.1: “Evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, yo so bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto, tassa yo pubbe chando ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yo tajjo chando so paṭippassaddho;
sn51.15:8.2: yaṃ pubbe vīriyaṃ ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yaṃ tajjaṃ vīriyaṃ taṃ paṭippassaddhaṃ;
sn51.15:8.3: yaṃ pubbe cittaṃ ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yaṃ tajjaṃ cittaṃ taṃ paṭippassaddhaṃ;
sn51.15:8.4: yā pubbe vīmaṃsā ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yā tajjā vīmaṃsā sā paṭippassaddhā.
sn51.15:8.5: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, brāhmaṇa, iti evaṃ sante, santakaṃ vā hoti no asantakaṃ vā”ti?
sn51.15:9.1: “Addhā, bho ānanda, evaṃ sante, santakaṃ hoti no asantakaṃ.
sn51.15:9.2: Abhikkantaṃ, bho ānanda, abhikkantaṃ, bho ānanda.
sn51.15:9.3: Seyyathāpi, bho ānanda, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
sn51.15:9.5: evamevaṃ bhotā ānandena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
sn51.15:9.6: Esāhaṃ, bho ānanda, taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn51.15:9.7: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ ānando dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
